surveyHK.name: Name
surveyHK.q1: 1. Have been fully vaccinated against COVID-19?
surveyHK.q2: 2. Have been abroad within one year?
surveyHK.q3: 3. Are suspected fever symptoms in the past two weeks?
surveyHK.q4: 4. Are dyspnea or cough symptoms in the past two weeks?
surveyHK.q5: 5. Are there changes in taste or loss of taste?
surveyHK.q6: 6. Whether the surrounding population in the family is COVID-19 infected?
surveyHK.q7: 7. Whether the surrounding population in the working place is COVID-19 infected?
surveyHK.q8: 8. Have been in close contact with someone who has COVID-19?
surveyHK.q9: 9. Have been tested(RT-PCR) for the coronavirus in the last 10 days?
surveyHK.q8_Option3: been sneezed on or coughed on by confirmed patients
surveyHK.q9_Option3: Yes, still waiting for the result
